Source code for reporter.api

"""Frontend"""

import os
import json
from .paths import REPO_PATH, IDS, GIT_PATH
from .commands import Commands
from .utils import set_search_paths, set_input_data


[docs]def set_all():
    """Set all directories on first run"""
    set_search_paths()
    repos = set_input_data()

    ids = {}
    for ind, val in enumerate(repos.keys()):
        ids[ind] = val
    with open(IDS, "r") as rhand:
        json.dump(ids, rhand)



[docs]def repositories():
    """Show all available repositories, path, and unique ID"""



[docs]def load(repo_id):
    """Load a repository with specified id"""
    with open(IDS, "r") as rhand:
        repo_ids = json.load(rhand)
    name = repo_ids[repo_id]

    with open(REPO_PATH, "r") as rhand:
        paths = json.load(rhand)
    path = paths[name]

    with open(GIT_PATH, "r") as rhand:
        git_path = json.load(rhand)
    exe = git_path["git"]

    return Commands(name, path, exe)



[docs]def show_repo_status():
    """See status of all repositories"""
    os.system("cls")
    current_dir = os.getcwd()

    with open(REPO_PATH) as rhand:
        dirs = json.load(rhand)

    git_exec = dirs["git"]

    for name, direc in dirs.items():
        if name == "git":
            continue
        knife = Commands(name, direc, git_exec)
        knife.fetch()
        yield knife.status()
    os.chdir(current_dir) # return to original dir
